title: Biden address gives warnings and optimism
shortDescription: President Joe Biden bid farewell to the nation and his 50 year political career with an address warning against an oligarchy while offering optimism.

title: A look inside Joe Biden's farewell address from the Oval Office
shortDescription: President Joe Biden will give his farewell primetime address to the nation Wednesday as he enters the final days of his administration and as President-elect Donald Trump prepares to return to the White House.

title: President Biden warns of American 'oligarchy' as he bids farewell
shortDescription: Joe Biden, who will be replaced by Donald Trump in five days, defended his legacy and the importance of American democracy in an Oval Office address

title: Trump's stance on TikTok ban? How his views have changed
shortDescription: As a potential TikTok ban looms, here's how President-elect Donald Trump views banning the app, and how his stance, has changed.

title: Senator proposes bill to let Iowa buy 9 Minnesota counties
shortDescription: Sen. Mike Bousselot, R-Ankeny, proposed a bill that would let Iowa buy nine Minnesota counties.

title: Takeaways as nominees Pam Bondi, Marco Rubio go before Senate
shortDescription: Trump's nominees for secretary of State, attorney general, CIA director, Energy secretary and Transportation secretary went before Senate committees.

title: At Pam Bondi's hearing, Trump FBI pick Kash Patel got a grilling
shortDescription: Several senators questioned Pam Bondi at her confirmation hearing Wednesday about President-elect Donald Trump's choice of Kash Patel to lead the FBI.

title: Trump's crowd-size obsession to be tested at inauguration after 2017 controversy
shortDescription: With Trump's second inauguration a week away and his fixation with attendance numbers at his public events undiminished, crowd size will be front and center.

title: 'Disappointing': Jill Biden addresses 2024 division with Nancy Pelosi
shortDescription: Nancy Pelosi was a crucial, behind-the-scenes voice last summer urging Joe Biden to drop out of the race against Donald Trump.

title: Donald Trump urges Vivek Ramaswamy to take vacant Ohio Senate seat
shortDescription: Gov. Mike DeWine must pick someone to replace Vice President-elect JD Vance, who resigned his Senate seat last week.

title: Governors in 8 states will raise flags for Trump inauguration
shortDescription: Although the U.S. flag is at half-staff to mark the death of President Jimmy Carter, 8 Republican-led states will raise flags for Trump's inauguration

title: Ratcliffe eyes China in Trump CIA director hearing
shortDescription: Republicans and Democrats praised the former lawmaker and intelligence official, who vowed not to use political loyalty tests at the CIA.

title: Trump's attorney general pick refuses to discuss TikTok ban with senators
shortDescription: Pam Bondi, Trump's choice to become attorney general, refused to talk at her Senate confirmation hearing about enforcing the law that threatens to ban TikTok.

title: Biden greenlights last big batch of student loan relief
shortDescription: On Wednesday, the federal Education Department approved $4.5 billion in student loan forgiveness for 261,000 former Ashford University students.

title: Trump Energy department pick calls for more domestic energy production
shortDescription: Trump Energy nominee Chris Wright's Senate confirmation hearing was briefly stopped by protestors shouting about the LA wildfires and global warming.

title: 'Politics will not play a part': Sparks fly over Trump picks for DOJ lawyers
shortDescription: Trump's pick to have defense lawyers lead the Justice Department sparked some concerns. They will likely to be front and center at today's confirmation hearing.

title: Confirmapalooza: Trump picks push through Senate hearings: Recap
shortDescription: Pam Bondi, Donald Trump's choice for attorney general, survived an at times contentious hearing while declining to say if Joe Biden won the 2020 vote.
